name: DEEP UNDER (itch)
description:
DEEP UNDER is a Game developped for the WonderJam UQAC 2021 :

The main theme was "Resistance", and we had Horror, Coop and Course as Gameplay constraints.

From that we built a Horror game in local cooperation. One player need to escape the compromised complex, and the other must guide him. But be aware, there is something hiding in the shadows, you better not run out of light...

Communication is key !
Have fun :)
